Plot: The entire Globe and its inhabitants are facing environmental issues and challenges. Every country have their struggle and have to focus on how to get solutions for their respective issues....
Title: Ocean Consciousness
Writer: Semeon Charles, Semeon Charles (story), Fayolle Jean Francois Cedric (story), Fayolle Jean Francois Cedric
Actors: Jean Rodney Edouard, Fayolle Jean Francois Cedric, Rambert Geralde, Roger Grenouillet
